org.pragmaticminds.crunch.execution

Class SortGraphFlow<T extends MRecord>

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.stream.stage.GraphStageWithMaterializedValue<S,akka.NotUsed>
      • akka.stream.stage.GraphStage<akka.stream.FlowShape<T,T>>
        • org.pragmaticminds.crunch.execution.SortGraphFlow<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.stream.Graph<akka.stream.FlowShape<T,T>,akka.NotUsed>, Serializable

    public class SortGraphFlow<T extends MRecord>
extends akka.stream.stage.GraphStage<akka.stream.FlowShape<T,T>>
implements Serializable
    Realizes the sorting of incoming records by timestamps in a defined sort window. Records outside the defined window a discarded.
    Author:
    Erwin Wagasow Created by Erwin Wagasow on 04.10.2018
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
